text:
Consider a classless addressing scheme using CIDR. A router has the following entries in its routing table:

192.168.0.0/22 -> Interface A
192.168.4.0/23 -> Interface B
192.168.6.0/24 -> Interface C
192.168.7.0/25 -> Interface D
Default -> Interface E

Which of the following destination IP addresses will be forwarded to Interface D?

A message of 1000 bytes is to be transmitted between two nodes using a packet-switched network. The packet size is 100 bytes, and the transmission rate is 1 Mbps. The propagation delay is 5 ms, and each packet requires 1 ms of processing delay at each intermediate node. If there is one intermediate node between the source and destination, what is the total end-to-end delay for the message?
Which of the following is a commonly used error detection code for data transmission?
